alert.note: Alert for Weld (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 21 at 8:02PM MDT until June 21 at 8:30PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Weld County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 830 PM MDT. * At 802 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Mead, or 15 miles southwest of Greeley, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Johnstown and Platteville around 815 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Milliken and Gilcrest. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
